about_the_game:
Story:

Player control Terlander gangster in this 3rd person shooter game. Terlander player who live in dystopian world. World is full of infected zombies and super zombies. Also enemy soldiers hunts down survival people and zombies. As player is gangster his only mission is to kill enemies and find money bags in 5 different cities. Player have different weapons like pistol, rifle, submachine and he can also use armored vehicle or normal vehicle. Both vehicles have fuel consumption. So be the biggest robber in hole world and collect money bags. Player can also collect more weapons and ammos. Game contains 5 big worlds

Features:

- 5 different cities full of zombies and soldiers
- Try to find money bags to get rich
- 3 different ai opponents like zombies, super zombies and soldiers

  • Armored vehicle with weapons

  • Normal vehicles with fuel consumption

name: Money Theft

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nividia 2000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nividia 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9

short_description: Terlander gangster live in dystopian world which is full of zombies and enemy soldiers. Only way to survive is kill enemies and find money bags
